CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 共同地；一样地；在两方面同样地

word_group.brief_definition: 过度劳累, (起早贪黑而疲惫不堪)超负荷工作
word_group.phrase: burn the candle at both ends

word_group.brief_definition: 分成相等的两注的；进入竞赛的前三名　（或大型竞赛的前四名）的
使收支相抵；量入为出；勉强维持生计
对双方都适用；兼有利弊；有利有弊

word_group.phrase: have a foot in both camps

word_group.brief_definition: 为获利而脚踏两只船；使鹬蚌相争而渔翁得利
word_group.phrase: play both ends against the middle
have both feet on the ground
keep both feet on the ground

word_group.brief_definition: 抱有不切实际的希望；提出不合情理的要求
word_group.phrase: want one's bread buttered on both sides
take one's courage in both hands

bilingual.source: Enslaved Black men fought on both sides of the war.
bilingual.target: 被奴役的黑人在战争的双方作战。
这次交易对双方都有利。
这个协议对双方都有利。

bilingual.source: The contract was ratified by both parties involved.
The debate was hotly contested by both sides.
This treaty is beneficial to both parties.
bilingual.target: 这份合约对双方都有利。

bilingual.source: Both sides are satisfied with the outcome.
bilingual.target: 双方都对结果感到满意。
这次合作对双方都有好处。

list.abstract: 形容词adj. 1.两...（都）,两个...（都） Both his eyes were seriously burned. 他的双眼都严重烧伤了。 代词pron. 1.两者（都）;两个（都）;双方（都） Why not buy both? 为什么不把两件都买下？ 副词adv. 1.并；又；两者皆 We like Amy and Phil both. 艾米和菲尔两个我们都喜欢。 连接词conj. 1.既。..且。..;...和。..都 The prospects both excited and worried me. 这前景即使我激动又令我忧虑。

yingyinNormal.en: I expect there's a good deal to be said on both sides. Don't be so feeble!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想双方都有各自充分的理由。别这么软弱！

yingyinNormal.en: Bernie, this is our kid's name. I think we should both agree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妮妮，这是我们孩子的名字。我们应该双方都同意吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, everyone wants it, on both sides,but we do get on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，双方家族都希望促成我们但我们相处得挺融洽。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, but in Ross's case, they both know in two weeks that's it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，罗斯的情况是，他们“双方”都知道，只有2星期。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you both for agreeing to sit down. Make it quick. I have work to do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感谢你们双方同意坐下来协商。快点吧，我还有工作要做。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not changing what I believe. But a good debater needs to be able to argue both sides.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没有改变我的信念，但一个好的辩手要兼顾正反双方。

yingyinNormal.en: There's gonna be a couple of interviews today, Ben. We want to make sure that we both find the right fit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天会有好几场面试，本，我们希望双方都能认同职位的合适度。

yingyinNormal.en: David, both our clients have been bloodied here, and there's no way to predict which way the judge will go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大卫，我们双方的当事人都付出代价了，我们无法预测法官会怎么判。

yingyinNormal.en: Because knowing both sides of the coin, I really think that there is a love story willing to be told, willing to unfold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为我同时了解双方，所以我相信，两者之间有一个爱情故事将要讲述，将要展开。

yingyinNormal.en: I think in any healthy relationship, or friendship, or marriage, isn't it important for both sides to make an effort to understand the other?
yingyinNormal.zh: 在任何一个健康的关系中，在友谊，在婚姻中，双方不是都要努力去理解对方的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And we were reminded of this in August when countries on both sides of the first world war came together to remember in peace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今年八月我们对这个词深有感触，当交战双方诸国聚到一起，和平地纪念第一次世界大战。

yingyinNormal.en: And so imagine one more thing: that that software is able to ask both parties for mutual consents, Would you be willing to meet your third cousin? And if we both say yes, voila! Welcome to chromosomally LinkedIn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么再像一下：如果软件可向双方征询同意书“你想不想与你的三表兄见面？”如果两人都说是。耶！欢迎来到染色体LinkedIn网站。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh no, both of us alone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不好，是我们两个单独相处。

yingyinNormal.en: Both of those Joey? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这两个都是乔伊吧。是的。

yingyinNormal.en: You and me both, brother.
yingyinNormal.zh: 摊上你，我也不是靠运气的。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you both like lettuce?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们俩喜欢生菜吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh. She took us both out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她把我们俩都拒之门外了。

yingyinNormal.en: He was? We both were. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是真的吗？我们两个一样，真的。

yingyinNormal.en: We can both play this game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要斗嘴谁怕谁。

yingyinNormal.en: Both the cell and the landline…
yingyinNormal.zh: 手机和固话……

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Both</highlight> France and the United States are involved in the organization's work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国和美国都参与了该组织的工作。

examination_example.sentence: The court's ruling is a step forward in the struggle against <highlight>both</highlight> corruption and official favoritism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最高法院的裁决是在与腐败、“公务偏袒”这两者的斗争中所取得的一个进步。

examination_example.sentence: Reforming the system would help <highlight>both</highlight> lawyers and their customers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 改革这一体系将对律师和他们的客户都有帮助。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>both</highlight> these criteria would be at the expense of time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这两个标准都将以时间为代价。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Both</highlight> apps, however, were later scrapped, after Microsoft said it had used their best features in its own products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这两个应用程序后来都被废弃了，因为微软表示，它已经在自己的产品中使用了它们最好的功能。

examination_example.sentence: Like physical fights, verbal fights can leave <highlight>both</highlight> sides bloodied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和肢体冲突一样，言语冲突也会让双方流血。

word_usage.usage: both用作形容词指“两个；俩”时，只用作定语，是前位限定词，常与复数名词连用。

all 与 both 都可用于名词之前，常与限定词the、this、 my等连用。二者的区别是：
all可与可数名词的单、复数或不可数名词连用； 而 both 只能与复数的可数名词连用。
当这两个词与可数名词的复数形式连用时，all 指三个或三个以上； 而both则指两个。
both与复数名词连用时，若该名词前有the、these或物主代词，其前用both或both of均可，当both跟who或人称代词搭配时只能用both of。

both用作代词时，一般不用于否定句，如用否定句也只表示部分否定，不是“都不”而是“不都”。
例：Both the instruments are not precision ones. 这两个仪器并非都是精密仪器。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: There are two main groups of bats, which are believed to have evolved independently of each other, but <highlight>both</highlight> from a common ancestor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蝙蝠有两大类，据信它们是独立进化的，但都来自同一个祖先。

examination_example.sentence: Those who have <highlight>both</highlight> skill and experience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些既有技能又有经验的人。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Both</highlight> individuals and businesses post regularly to engage and interact with people from around the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 个人和企业都定期发布帖子，与来自世界各地的人进行互动。

word_usage.usage:
both...and...连接两个形容词时，不可用作定语，但可用作表语。
示例：品学兼优的学生受人敬佩。
误 Both expert and red students are admired.
正 The students who are both expert and red are admired.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Math anxiety can severely disrupt students' performance in the subject in <highlight>both</highlight> primary and secondary school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数学焦虑会严重影响学生在小学和中学的成绩。

examination_example.sentence: They also harbor dozens of diseases that threaten <highlight>both</highlight> humans and farm animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们还藏匿着数十种威胁人类和家畜的疾病。

examination_example.sentence: The results are <highlight>both</highlight> interesting and humorous.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结果既有趣又幽默。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Both</highlight> of the dogs had been sent to the wrong destinations on connecting flights from Denver.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这两只狗在丹佛转机时都被送到了错误的目的地。

examination_example.sentence: They are growing larger, <highlight>both</highlight> in the sense that they occupy more land and that the trees in them are bigger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们变得越来越大，不仅是因为它们占据了更多的土地，而且其中的树木也变大了。

examination_example.sentence: What were the college students in <highlight>both</highlight> groups required to do in the study?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这项研究中，两组的大学生都被要求做什么?

word_usage.usage:
both...and...连接两个形容词时，不可用作定语，但可用作表语。
示例：品学兼优的学生受人敬佩。
误 Both expert and red students are admired.
正 The students who are both expert and red are admired.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Emotional intelligence, with its focus on <highlight>both</highlight> head and heart, may serve to point us in the right direction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 情商既关注头脑，也关注内心，可能会为我们指明正确的方向。

examination_example.sentence: Any public space has been carefully designed by an artistic mind to be <highlight>both</highlight> functional and beautiful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何公共空间都经过艺术头脑的精心设计，既实用又美观。

examination_example.sentence: Art products differ from most other commercial products because they have <highlight>both</highlight> commercial and cultural values.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术产品不同于大多数其他商业产品，因为它们同时具有商业和文化价值。

word_usage.usage:
如果名词前没有冠词、物主代词或指示代词，both 则单独用：
Both children have been to New York.
这两个孩子都去过纽约。
在人称代词前一定要用both of，不能说both we或both us；
遇见宾格代词，可在前面加both of （如both of us），或在其后只加 both （如 us both） ：
Both of us were asked to go abroad on business.
我们两人都应邀去外国出差。
The letter is addressed to us both/ both of us.
这封信是写给我们两个人的。（both前不加冠词）

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 过度劳累；(起早贪黑而疲惫不堪)超负荷工作
word_level_phrase_info.phrase: burn the candle at both ends

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Both</highlight> of them are very lovely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们两个都很可爱。

examination_example.sentence: Since he had never cooked, his parents were <highlight>both</highlight> there to help him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为他从来不做饭，他的父母都在那里帮助他。

examination_example.sentence: Speaking and writing are <highlight>both</highlight> forms of verbal communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 说和写都是语言交流的形式。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Both</highlight> tea and coffee are my favorite.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 茶和咖啡都是我的最爱。

examination_example.sentence: Then I noticed that the street signs were written in <highlight>both</highlight> Chinese and English.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我注意到路标是用中文和英文写的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Both</highlight> parents and their kids are working hard for a better future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母和他们的孩子都在为更美好的未来而努力。

word_usage.usage:
both... and...表示“…和…都”，当它连接并列主语时，谓语动词要用复数形式。
如：Both Lisa and Mike like swimming.
莉萨和迈克两个人都喜欢游泳。

both...and...连接两个形容词时，不可用作定语，但可用作表语。
示例：品学兼优的学生受人敬佩。
误 Both expert and red students are admired.
正 The students who are both expert and red are admired.
